column1: English Sent: In the event of two plates coming together they may either collide and crumble
column2: or one may slide under the other.

column1: Hindi Tansl: jaba xo pleta eka-xUsare ke karIba AwI hEM
column2: waba yA wo ve takarAkara tUta sakawI hEM yA eka pleta Pisala kara xUsarI pleta ke nIce jA sakawI hE.
